name: Half Adder
description: Create a half adder: adds two 1-bit numbers, outputs sum and carry
fullDescription: The half adder is the first step toward building a calculator! It adds two single bits and produces a Sum and a Carry output. The sum is 1 when inputs differ (that's XOR!), and carry is 1 when both inputs are 1 (that's AND!). Half adders are building blocks for full adders and multi-bit arithmetic units.
